Are you familiar with the smoldering bloodshard? It's near the Forge of Fury.

Bloodshards corrupt the land around them. Obviously, they'd also make good weapons, so I want this one destroyed.

Shouldn't be too tough for a like yourself.
Excellent work. There are enough dangers in Fyrmount without leaving one for Akasha or Bahaar or whomever to exploit.
